publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-443# Dr Elaine Murray: Scottish Executive Relocation Policy-That the Parliament is concerned that the formula used to shortlist locations suitable for the relocation of the Scottish Executive departments, agencies and non-departmental bodies is not resulting in jobs being dispersed adequately across Scotland and calls on the Executive to re-examine the criteria used to select such locations.

S2M-443# Dr Elaine Murray: Scottish Executive Relocation Policyâ€”That the Parliament is concerned that the formula used to shortlist locations suitable for the relocation of the Scottish Executive departments, agencies and non-departmental bodies is not resulting in jobs being dispersed adequately across Scotland and calls on the Executive to re-examine the criteria used to select such locations.
S2M-443# Scottish Executive Relocation Policy (lodged on 2 October 2003) Alex Neil*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Chris Ballance*, Kate Maclean*, Helen Eadie*, Marlyn Glen*, Margaret Jamieson*
S2M-443# Scottish Executive Relocation Policy (lodged on 2 October 2003) Mike Watson*, Mike Pringle*, Dr Jean Turner*, Pauline McNeill*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-443# Scottish Executive Relocation Policy (lodged on 2 October 2003) Irene Oldfather*
S2M-443# Scottish Executive Relocation Policy (lodged on 2 October 2003) Mark Ballard*, Robin Harper*
